column2: "Bio so sunsum no maa me do
column3: na ɔdze me baa EWURADZE fie boka afamu abotsen a ɔhwɛ boka no ano: na hwɛ
column4: mbarimba eduonu enum gyinagyina abotsen no ano; na muhun Azzur ba Jaazania na Benaia ba Pelatia

column2: "Na ɔsee me dɛ
column3: Onyimpa ba
column4: woyinom nye mbarimba a wɔhyehyɛ emumuyɛ wɔ tsirmu
column5: na wɔma apam bɔn wɔ kurow yi mu:"

column2: "hɔn a wɔka dɛ
column3: Aber a wɔdze si adan mmbɛnee: kurow yi nye dadzesɛn no

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: onyimpa ba

column2: "Na EWURADZE no sunsum tɔɔ mo do
column3: na ɔsee me dɛ
column5: Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Israelmba
column6: mbrɛ hom ase nye yi: na minyim ndzɛmba a aba hom adwen mu."

column2: "Hom ama hom atɔfoe adɔɔ so wɔ kurow yi mu
column3: na hom dze n’atɔfoe ahyehyɛ abrɔn no amaama."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hom atɔfoe a hom dze egugu mu no
column3: hɔn nye nam no
column4: na kurow yi nye dadzesɛn no: na wɔdze hom befi mu efir."

column2: "Hom esuro afona no; na medze afona no bɛba hom do
column3: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse."

column2: "Na medze hom befi mu efir edzi na medze hom ahyɛ ananaben nsa
column3: na mayɛ m’atsɛmbudze wɔ hom mu."

column2: "Hom bɔtotɔ afona ano: mubobu hom atsɛn wɔ Israel he do; na hom bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."
"Kurow yi rennyɛ hom dadzesɛn
column3: eso hom rennyɛ nam wɔ mu; mubobu hom atsɛn wɔ Israel he do;"

column2: "na hom bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE: osiandɛ hom annantsew m’ahyɛdze do
column3: eso hom annyɛ m’atsɛmbudze
column4: mbom hom ekedzi amanaman a etwa hom ho ehyia no hɔn mmom do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: mehyɛɛ nkɔm no
column4: nna Benaia ba Pelatia wui. Nna medze m’enyim butuuw famu
column5: na medze ndze kɛse mekaa mu dɛ
column7: aso iboku Israel nkaa no ase koraa?"

column2: "Na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ
column3: dɛ
column11: hɔn nye hɔn a Jerusalɛmmba ase hɔn dɛ
column12: Hom mfi EWURADZE nkyɛn nkɔ ekyirekyir; hɛn na wɔdze asaase yi ama hɛn dɛ enyadze:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi se dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Kaansa meyi hɔn akɔ ekyirekyir amanaman mu
column4: na mabɔ hɔn apetse nkurow nkurow mu mpo a
column5: mebɛyɛ hɔn krɔnkrɔn bea mber kakra wɔ nkurow nkurow a wɔakɔ do no do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi se dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Mobɔboaboa hom ano efi aman mu
column4: na mapon hom ehyia efi nkurow nkurow a wɔabɔ hom apetse hɔ no do
column5: na medze Israel asaase ama hom."

column2: "Na wɔbɛba hɔ na wobeyi no mu atantandze nyina na no mu ekyiwadze nyinara efi hɔ."
"Na mebɛma hɔn akoma kor
column3: na medze sunsum fofor ahyɛ hom mu; na mibeyi ɔbo akoma no mefi hɔn honam mu

column2: "ama wɔaanantsew m’ahyɛdze do
column3: na woedzi mo mmom do
column4: na wɔaayɛ: na wɔbɛyɛ me man

column2: "Na hɔn a hɔn akoma dzi hɔn atantandze na hɔn ekyiwadze akoma ekyir no dze
column3: medze hɔn akwan bobua hɔn etsifi

column2: "Nna kerubfo no memaa hɔn ntsaban do
column3: na nhwiir no dzi hɔn nkyɛnmu; na Israel Nyankopɔn n’enyimnyam wɔ hɔn do wɔ sor."

column2: "Na EWURADZE n’enyimnyam fi kurow no ne finimfin foow sor
column3: na okegyinaa bepɔw a ɔda kurow no no boka afamu no no do."

column2: "Na sunsum no maa me do
column3: na ɔdze me nam Nyankopɔn no sunsum do kɔr Kaldea ndɔmmumkɔfo no nkyɛn wɔ enyido adzehu mu. Nna enyido adzehu a muhunii no ofii mo do kɔr sor."

column2: "Nna mekaa ndzɛmba a EWURADZE dze kyerɛɛ me no nyinara ho asɛm kyerɛɛ ndɔmmumkɔfo no."
